results.title: Photobiomodulation promotes neural regeneration when compared to simvastatin treatment in a sciatic nerve crush model.
results.text_hl: The sciatic functional index (SFI), @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal heat hyperalgesia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical hyperalgesia@@@, and thermographic evaluation were used as analyses.

citations.NLM: de Souza LG, Hendler KG, Marcolino AM, Kuriki HU, Cardoso RB, de Cássia Registro Fonseca M, Barbosa RI. Photobiomodulation promotes neural regeneration when compared to simvastatin treatment in a sciatic nerve crush model. Lasers Med Sci. 2021 Oct;36(8):1591-1597. PMID: 33210186

results.title: Identification of prophylactic drugs for oxaliplatin-induced peripheral neuropathy using big data.
results.text_hl: Retrospective medical chart review included clinical data from Tokushima University Hospital from April 2009 to March 2018. RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, indicated for @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, significantly reduced the severity of @DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@oxaliplatin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@hyperalgesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Zamami Y, Niimura T, Kawashiri T, Goda M, Naito Y, Fukushima K, Ushio S, Aizawa F, Hamano H, Okada N, Yagi K, Miyata K, Takechi K, Chuma M, Koyama T, Kobayashi D, Shimazoe T, Fujino H, Izawa-Ishizawa Y, Ishizawa K. Identification of prophylactic drugs for oxaliplatin-induced peripheral neuropathy using big data. Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 Apr;148():112744. PMID: 35240525

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on sensorial, motor, and morphological parameters in sciatic nerve crush induced-neuropathic pain in rats.
results.text_hl: However, both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Gabapentin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077206 @@@gabapentin@@@ treatments failed in attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@cold allodynia@@@ or improved motor function.

citations.NLM: Corso CR, Martins DF, Borges SC, Beltrame OC, Telles JEQ, Buttow NC, Werner MFP. Effect of simvastatin on sensorial, motor, and morphological parameters in sciatic nerve crush induced-neuropathic pain in rats. Inflammopharmacology. 2018 Jun;26(3):793-804. PMID: 29188473

results.title: RhoA/Rho kinase pathway contributes to the pathogenesis of thermal hyperalgesia in diabetic mice.
results.text_hl: The expression of @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_18127 @@@eNOS@@@ and NO metabolite contents in the spinal cord was decreased in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, and these changes were normalized by treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The present results show that HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors have an inhibitory effect on @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal hyperalgesia@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, which is mediated by an increase in NO production through the inhibition of @GENE_RHOA @GENE_11848 @@@RhoA@@@/ROCK pathways.

citations.NLM: Ohsawa M, Aasato M, Hayashi SS, Kamei J. RhoA/Rho kinase pathway contributes to the pathogenesis of thermal hyperalgesia in diabetic mice. Pain. 2011 Jan;152(1):114-122. PMID: 20980102
citations.BibTeX: @article{20980102, title={RhoA/Rho kinase pathway contributes to the pathogenesis of thermal hyperalgesia in diabetic mice.}, author={Ohsawa M and Aasato M and Hayashi SS and Kamei J}, journal={Pain}, volume={152}, number={1}, pages={114-122}}

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates formalin-induced nociceptive behaviors by inhibiting microglial RhoA and p38 MAPK activation.
results.text_hl: Intrathecal pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly attenuated the second phase of the acute nociceptive response to @CHEMICAL_Formaldehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005557 @@@formalin@@@ injection, and daily administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 7 days inhibited the long-term @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical hyperalgesia@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Formaldehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005557 @@@formalin@@@ injection.

citations.NLM: Chen XY, Li K, Light AR, Fu KY. Simvastatin attenuates formalin-induced nociceptive behaviors by inhibiting microglial RhoA and p38 MAPK activation. J Pain. 2013 Nov;14(11):1310-9. PMID: 23900131
citations.BibTeX: @article{23900131, title={Simvastatin attenuates formalin-induced nociceptive behaviors by inhibiting microglial RhoA and p38 MAPK activation.}, author={Chen XY and Li K and Light AR and Fu KY}, journal={J Pain}, volume={14}, number={11}, pages={1310-9}}

results.title: Statins alleviate experimental nerve injury-induced neuropathic pain.
results.text_hl: Systemic daily administration of either statin from days 0 to 14 completely prevented the development of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal hyperalgesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Shi XQ, Lim TKY, Lee S, Zhao YQ, Zhang J. Statins alleviate experimental nerve injury-induced neuropathic pain. Pain. 2011 May;152(5):1033-1043. PMID: 21414721
citations.BibTeX: @article{21414721, title={Statins alleviate experimental nerve injury-induced neuropathic pain.}, author={Shi XQ and Lim TKY and Lee S and Zhao YQ and Zhang J}, journal={Pain}, volume={152}, number={5}, pages={1033-1043}}
